titles.title: A concurrent resolution to congratulate Costa Rican President Oscar Arias Sanchez on being awarded the 1987 Nobel Peace Prize.

calendar.text: Submitted in the Senate. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 378.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate as modified, without amendment and with a preamble by Yea-Nay Vote. 92-3. Record Vote No: 327.

bill.summary: 10/14/1987--Introduced. Congratulates Costa Rican President Oscar Arias Sanchez on being awarded the 1987 Nobel Peace Prize. Recognizes the signing of the August 7 Guatemala peace accord as an historic achievement and an opportunity for the Presidents of Central America to work together towards peace. Urges the parties to the accord to implement all of its provisions in good faith, and pledges the Congress' support and full cooperation with respect to such implementation.
